item.description:
Dedicate a weekend to Bliss, Sensuality & Ecstasy!
Taught by Steve and Lokita Carter; lineage holders of Margot Anand’s SkyDancing Institute

Westport, CT: March 25-27, 2011


•Fine tune your skills in the art of ecstatic touch
•Learn a sensuous, healing, and pleasurable whole-body massage
•Integrate spirituality and physical pleasure
•Explore the surrender of giving and receiving
•Open new doors to the heart of your beloved
•Allow more pleasure and trust in your relationship

Tantric touch, ritual and communication are the foundations for this sensuous weekend. As you gently tune into each other, the difference between giving and receiving dissolves into a harmonious flow of your ecstatic energies. This weekend is an ideal opportunity to explore the fine line between sensuality and sexuality and to deepen your connection and love.

This workshop is open to couples and individuals. Couples will work together exclusively during the massages unless they desire otherwise. There will be an equal number of men and women present.

Logistics: Starts Friday at 6.45pm with registration and dinner, followed by an evening session, and ends on Sunday around 4.30pm.

Costs: $465 per person includes the seminar; meals from Friday dinner to Sunday lunch; massage oil. The workshop will be held at a private residence. For lodging we recommend the following nearby hotels:

WESTPORT INN
NORWALK INN
MARRIOT COURTYARD NORWALK
SHERATON FOUR POINTS NORWALK
HILTON INN NORWALK

Deposit: of $195 per person reserves your place. The workshop begins at 6.30 pm Friday with dinner, registration and an evening session and ends at approximately 12pm Sunday, followed by lunch.

Cancellation Policy: If you cancel more than two weeks before the event, you will receive a full refund less a processing fee of $50 per person. If you cancel less than two weeks before the event, there will be no refund unless in extenuating circumstances in which case we reserve the right to a partial refund and/or credit for future events sponsored by us within 12 months of original event date. That having been said, note that if you do need to cancel, we do our best to accommodate you as much as we possibly can.

REGISTER ON LINE HERE

or contact your co-organizer, Pam, at ashimoremethod@gmail.com
ASHIMORE CENTER
item.name: Tantric Massage: A Tantra Workshop on the Art of Ecstatic Touch
